text: The 2018–19 GFA Premier League is the 35th season of the GFA Premier League, the top division football competition in Grenada. The season began on 24 August 2018.Grenada 2018/19, RSSSF.com ==Team Information== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Team ! City !
